onAddAppButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentView
The onAddAppButton method loads the Add Appointment screen.
onAddCust(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerRecords
The onAddCust method loads the Add Customer screen.
onAll(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentView
The onAll method sets the items in the table view to show all appointments in the database.
onBackButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerRecords
The onBackButton method loads the Appointments View screen.
onByMonth(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsView
The onByMonth method sets the items in the combo box to a list of all months in the year, sets the labels to month, and sets the value of total appointments to "##".
onByType(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsView
The onByType method sets the items in the combo box to a list of all appointment types in the database, sets the labels to type, and sets the value of total appointments to "##".
onByUser(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsView
The onByUser method sets the items in the combo box to a list of all users in the database, sets the labels to user, and sets the value of total appointments to "##".
onCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointment
The onCancel method alerts the user that the appointment information has not been saved and returns to Appointments View on confirmation.
onCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomer
The onCancel method alerts the user that the customer information has not been saved and returns to Customer Records on confirmation.
onCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointment
The onCancel method alerts the user that the appointment information has not been saved and returns to Appointments View on confirmation
onCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomer
The onCancel method alerts the user that the customer information has not been saved and returns to Customer Records on confirmation.
onCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsView
The onCancel method returns to the Appointments View screen.
onContactID(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsView
The onContactID method sets the items in the table view to only the appointments connected to the selected contact based on the contactID.
onCountry(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomer
The onCountry method sets the State/Province combo box to the correct list of states or provinces based on the country selected.
onCountry(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyCustomer
The onCountry method sets the State/Province combo box to the correct list of states or provinces based on the country selected.
onCustTableButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentView
The onCustTableButton method loads the Customer Records screen.
onDeleteAppButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentView
The onDeleteAppButton method confirms that the user wants to delete the selected appointment and removes it from the database upon confirmation.
onDeleteCust(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerRecords
The onDeleteCust method confirms that the user wants to delete the selected customer and removes it from the database upon confirmation.
onEndDate(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointment
The onEndDate method checks if the start date is after the end date and throws an error if it is.
onEndDate(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointment
The onEndDate method checks if the start date is after the end date and throws an error if it is.
onEndTime(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointment
The onEndTime method checks if the start time is after the end time and throws an error if it is.
onEndTime(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointment
The onEndTime method checks if the start time is after the end time and throws an error if it is.
onLoginButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LogIn
The onLoginButton method loads the Appointments View screen and passes it the user information based on the username entered into the text field "userName".
onLogOut(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentView
The onLogOut method confirms that the user wishes to log out of the program and returns to Login on confirmation.
onModAppButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentView
The onModAppButton method loads the Modify Appointment screen and passes it the selected appointment from the table view.
onModCust(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerRecords
The onModCust method loads the Modify Customer screen and passes it the selected customer from the table view.
onMonthRadio(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentView
The onMonthRadio method sets the items in the table view to only the appointments that occur in the same calendar month as the system's current date.
onReportButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentView
The onReportButton method loads the Reports screen.
onSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointment
The onSave method collects all the information entered into the various fields and creates a new appointment based on those fields.

The onSave method collects all the information entered into the various fields and creates a new appointment based on those fields.

onStartDate(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointment
The onStartDate method sets the end date date picker to the selected start date.
onStartDate(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointment
The onStartDate method sets the end date date picker to the selected start date.
onStartTime(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointment
The onStartTime method sets the end time combo box value to 30 minutes after the selected start time.
onStartTime(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyAppointment
The onStartTime method sets the end time combo box value to 30 minutes after the selected start time.
onTotalAppComboBox(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsView
The onTotalAppComboBox method checks the combo box selection and sets the value of the total appointments based on the selection class.
onWeekRadio(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentView
The onWeekRadio method sets the items in the table view to only the appointments that occur in the upcoming week based on the system's current date.
